text.style: fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 66px; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre;

line.style: stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 14px; fill: none; stroke: rgb(249, 249, 249); transform-origin: 184px 227.38px;

polyline.style: fill: none; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 14px; stroke: rgb(249, 249, 249);
